<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%>, when I <S%G2064>came<s%>, I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> them of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>; having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the joy of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be unto <S%G2316>God<s%>, which <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2358>causeth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2358>triumph<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> maketh <S%G5319>manifest<s%> the <S%G3744>savour<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>.
